trends: There have been no other sightings in Fremantle
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson the evening of sunday the 14th of june, myself and my team of paranormal investigators where arriving at the fremantle prison for an tour evening we where helping with. (the prison is now a major tourist attraction). it was approximately 17.58hours, and the sun had set some 30mins prior. as wer were getting the equipment out of the car, i noticed a bright object in the sky, traveling approx nw to se. one of our investigators erica keijzer had her camera at the ready and took the included video. the object was the brightest in the sky, and was moving in a straight direction, and quite fast. as erica filmed it, my son and i took time to note the conditions. it was cloudy to the east, and the object eventually disappeared into the clouds. the footage hows a few things. the place we were, you can see the stacks of the old prison, the camera went from enhanced nigt mode to super night shot, and had to reframe to get good reference points. the object pulsated, and it appeared to to resemble any known aircraft i\we have seen. it moved fluidly, and at a constant speed. there were high clouds, but this flew under them, until it disappeared into a cloud in the sw of our position.
